data.title: Robert Black, horoscope for birth date 21 April 1947, born in Falkirk, with Astrodatabank biography
data.meta_description: Horoscope and astrology data of Robert Black born on 21 April 1947 Falkirk, Scotland, with biography
data.text:
Name

Black, Robert Gender: M

born on 21 April 1947 at 20:35 (= 8:35 PM ) Place Falkirk, Scotland, 56n00, 3w48 Timezone BDST h2e (is daylight saving time) Data source

Quoted BC/BR

Rodden Rating AA Collector: Gerard

Astrology data 00°49' 08°37 Asc. 22°27'

Biography

Scottish kidnapper and child molester suspected of committing three unsolved murders. He abducted and sexually assaulted a six-year-old child on 14 July 1990. On 10 August 1990, he was sentenced to life imprisonment.

Events

Crime : Sex Perpetration/Rape 14 July 1990 (Sexually assaulted six-year-old)

chart Placidus Equal_H.

Crime : Kidnap Perpetration 14 July 1990 (Six-year-old)

chart Placidus Equal_H.

Social : Institutionalized - prison, hospital 10 August 1990 (Sentenced to life)

chart Placidus Equal_H.

Source Notes

Pulsar No.5 quotes B.C.

Categories

Passions : Sexuality : Sexual abuser (Sex assault of six-year-old)

Passions : Criminal Perpetrator : Homicide involvement (Suspect)

Passions : Criminal Perpetrator : Kidnapper (Six-year-old)
